sorcer.util

Class ServiceAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.util.ServiceAccessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicAccessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CatalogerAccessor, JobberAccessor, ProviderAccessor, SpacerAccessor, TransactionManagerAccessor

    public class ServiceAccessor
extends Object
implements DynamicAccessor
    A service discovery and management utility allowing to access services by matching service templates and passing filters provided by clients. The optional usage of a service lookup cache is provided for clients that require lookup for multiple services frequently.

    A similar service discovery and management functionality is provided by a SORCER Cataloger service provider with round robin load balancing.

    The continuous discovery of SORCER services is usually delegated to Catalogers while other SORCER service providers can query effectively Cataloger's cached services with round robin load balancing.

    The individual SORCER services should be accessed using the ProviderAccessor subclass, that uses local cached proxies for frequently used SORCER infrastructure services. ProviderAccessor normally uses Cataloger if available, otherwise uses Jini lookup services as implemented by the ServiceAccessor.

    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski
    See Also:
    ProviderAccessor

      • getServiceItem

        public ServiceItem getServiceItem(String providerName,
                                  Class serviceType)
        Returns a service item containing a service matching providerName and serviceType using Jini lookup service.
        Parameters:
        providerName - name of the requested provider
        serviceType - type of the requested provider
        Returns:
        a SORCER provider

      • getServiceItem

        protected ServiceItem getServiceItem(Class serviceType)
                              throws SignatureException
        Returns a service item containing a service matching only the serviceType. It uses Jini lookup service.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - type of the requested provider
        Returns:
        a SORCER provider
        Throws:
        SignatureException

      • getServiceItem

        public ServiceItem getServiceItem(ServiceTemplate template,
                                  ServiceItemFilter filter,
                                  String[] groups)
        Returns a service item matching a service template and passing a filter with Jini registration groups. Note that template matching is a remote operation - matching is done by lookup services while passing a filter is done on the client side. Clients should provide a service filter, usually as an object of an inner class. A filter narrows the template matching by applying more precise, for example boolean selection as required by the client. No lookup cache is used by this getServiceItem method.
        Parameters:
        template - template to match remotely.
        filter - filer to use or null.
        groups - lookup groups to search in.
        Returns:
        a ServiceItem that matches the template and filter or null if none is found.

      • getServiceItem

        public ServiceItem getServiceItem(ServiceItemFilter filter)
        Returns a service item using a lookup cache. The service item matches a service template and passes a filter associated with the lookup cache at the cache creation time. Also a returned service item passes the filter used as the parameter in this method.

        Note that template matching is a remote operation - matching is done by lookup services while passing a filter is done on the client side. Clients should provide a service filter, usually as an object of an inner class. A filter narrows the template matching by applying more precise, for example boolean selection as required by the client.

        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to apply.
        Returns:
        a ServiceItem matching the filter.

      • getServiceItems

        public ServiceItem[] getServiceItems(ServiceTemplate template,
                                     ServiceItemFilter filter,
                                     String[] groups)
        Returns all service items that match a service template and pass a filter with Jini registration groups. Note that template matching is a remote operation - matching is done by lookup services while passing a filter is done on the client side. Clients should provide a service filter, usually as an object of an inner class. A filter narrows the template matching by applying more precise, for example boolean selection as required by the client.
        Parameters:
        template - template to match remotely.
        filter - filer to use or null.
        groups - lookup groups to search in.
        Returns:
        a ServiceItem[] that matches the template and filter.

      • getServiceItems

        public ServiceItem[] getServiceItems(ServiceItemFilter filter)
        Returns a collection service items using a lookup cache. The service items match a service template and pass a filter associated with the lookup cache at the cache creation time. Also returned service items pass the filter used as the parameter in this method.

        Note that template matching is a remote operation - matching is done by lookup services while passing a filter is done on the client side. Clients should provide a service filter, usually as an object of an inner class. A filter narrows the template matching by applying more precise, for example boolean selection as required by the client.

        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to apply.
        Returns:
        a ServiceItem[] matching the filter.

      • openDiscoveryManagement

        protected void openDiscoveryManagement(String[] groups)
        Creates a service lookup and discovery manager with a provided service template, lookup cache filter, and list of jini groups.
        Parameters:
        groups - River group names

        public Object getService(ServiceID serviceID,
                         Class[] serviceTypes,
                         Entry[] attrSets,
                         String[] groups)

        Parameters:
        serviceID - a service provider ID
        serviceTypes - service types to match
        attrSets - a list of attributes describing the requested service
        groups - Jini lookup service groups
        Returns:
        a SORCER provider service
